Package com.etiennecollin.ift2255.clientCLI.models.data

Class Review

java.lang.Object
com.etiennecollin.ift2255.clientCLI.models.data.DatabaseObject
com.etiennecollin.ift2255.clientCLI.models.data.Review
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Review extends DatabaseObject
Represents a review in the system, extending the DatabaseObject class.
